overview: First ever live DVD from this legendary hard rock band!  Features live footage filmed in Poland in 2011/2012 plus road footage, studio footage, interviews with Mick Tucker, Cliff Evans and Doogie White and the "War Nation" music video. Bonus features include a photo gallery, discography, biography and more.  Filmed March 9, 2012 at the Stodola Club in Warsaw, Poland
title: Tank: War Machine Live
